title: Twisted Fate
body: Rito is been like 3 days now, any eta on when your going to fix him

replies.body:
Riot are yet to put all their cards on the table here with this one.

Maybe Riot changed TF's deck and he said "I'm out, I cant deal with this"?

Anyway I hear the problem is not so 'Straight' forward.

Nothing TF does really 'Suits' his playing style.

Ok im done with bad Dad jokes
